description.value: The sound spilling from your lips awakens intense hatred in your audience. A target must use a reaction to attack the creature nearest to it. If thereâ€™s more than one eligible creature, determine the target at random. If the creature cannot use a reaction, it instead becomes confused until the end of your next turn. A target rolls to attack with 3 banes if you whispered, 2 banes if you spoke, or 1 bane if you shouted.

system.casting: at level 1, 2 at level 3, or 4 at level 7, on your turn, no action required when you lack the confused, controlled, stunned, and unconscious afflictions
system.target: Each creature in a Size 3 space centered on you if you whisper, a Size 10 space if you speak, or a Size 60 space if you shout
